fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry

Class GlobalRegistryClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.registry.GlobalRegistryClient

  • public class GlobalRegistryClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The class RegistryClient provides a convenient intermediary to send requests to the registry and get answers back.

    Description

    For the component model, values put in and retrieved from the registry are strings with the format: value ::= rmi=hostname | socket=hostname:port

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2012-10-22

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
